proposal: Navigating the whimsical world of Ghibli Studio Store, where every fan finds a piece of magic, reminds us of the power of community. With 270 holders in the ETH network, you've built a spirited castle in the sky. Imagine enhancing this realm with our DEX or Lottery tools, where fans not only collect but also contribute to the Ghibli universe. Let's weave new tales together.
